text: لا يذوقون فيها بردا ولا شرابا

translations.translation: not tasting any coolness there or any drink,
Finding neither sleep nor any thing to drink
they shall taste in it no coolness, nor any pleasant drink
They will not feel cold nor taste any drink
They will neither taste anything cool in it, nor anything to drink.
Nothing cool shall they taste therein, nor any drink.
They shall not taste therein cool nor drink
tasting therein neither coolness nor any drink
Therein taste they neither coolness nor (any) drink
and where they will taste neither coolness nor any drink
They will not taste therein cool or any drink.
tasting in it neither any coolness nor drink,
Nothing cool shall they taste therein, nor any drink,
Nothing cool shall they taste therein, nor any drink.
tasting neither coolness nor any drink
They will taste therein neither coolness, nor drink.
They will not taste therein [any] coolness or drink
[78:24] tasting in it neither coolness, [neither] sleep, [something] which they will not taste [therein], nor drink, [nor] anything that is imbibed for the sake of its delightful taste,
(Therein) in the Fire (taste they neither coolness) cool water; and it is also said this means: sleep (nor (any) drink) cold drink

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { لاَّ يَذُوقُونَ فِيهَا بَرْداً وَلاَ شَرَاباً } فالبَردُ: النَّومُ

translations.translation: And His saying, {They will not taste therein any cold or heat} - so cold is sleep.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
وهم { لاَّ يَذُوقُونَ فِيهَا } أي: في جهنم البعد والحرمان { بَرْداً } لحرمانهم عن لذة برد اليقين في النشأة الأولى { وَلاَ شَرَاباً } [النبأ: 24] لأنهم لم يشربوا في النشأة الأولى من زلال الإيمان شربة
 ولا من رحيق العرفان جرعة

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
{ لا يَذُوقون فيها بَرْداً ولا شَراباً }: حال من ضمير " لابثين " أي: غير ذائقين فيها { برداً } أي: نسيماً بارداً
 بل لهباً حاراً
 { ولا شراباً } بارداً
